page.title: 12Health
page.content: The Village no longer has its own surgery. All{medical facilities}are based in the medical centre in {Williton. } Those who cannot travcel are collected in the{patients mini}bus and delivered to and returned from the surgery. {Medicines}are brought to a {distribution point}in the village for those who cannot get to the surgery. For many years the village has had a{resident nurse. } Deeane Close has an{elderly {community}complete with{wardens}and a 24 hour care service. A central hall acts as a community and social centre for the elderly. The nearest{hospital}to this area is in{Taunton}which is eight miles away.
